name: Cats 'n Flip
description:
Public alpha playtest
LATEST UPDATE: 14.10.2021 16:30
Uploaded first public version, 0.1014

Cats n' Flip is a casual mobile game developed with Unity as part of school project in Kajaani University of Applied Sciences. Our goal is to make addicting action arcade game inspired by likes of Fruit Ninja, with a splash of rhythm games like osu!

Goal of the game is simple - keep the pancakes in the air! Easy enough, when you have to deal with just one slow pancake but don't get too comfy! More pancakes will be added and the pace gets quicker and quicker.

When you have finished trying our game, please give us feedback! Our survey takes only couple minutes and helps us considerably!

LINK TO THE SURVEY: https://forms.gle/a2udmW18vrVzzSc26

Known issues and bugs:

  • some have issues with installing the APK, sorry about that
  • QUIT GAME BUTTON DOESN'T WORK
  • sometimes it's near impossible to see which pancake is falling next
  • missing animations
  • placeholder art
  • reward system and shop yet to be implemented
  • UI scaling issues with some resolutions

Team Random Group 2:
Olli Ojalainen - Producer
Panu Piippo - Lead programmer
Peter Pulkkinen - Art and design lead
Aleksi Virolainen - Artist
Mariia Gavrilieva - Artist
